text: Ara samuda jati prati tadera bha'i saleha ke prerana kari; tini balalena, he amara jati. Allahara bandegi kara, tini chara tomadera kona upasya na'i. Tini'i yamina hate tomaderake payada karechena, tanmadhye tomaderake basati dana karechena. Ata'eba; tamra kache ksama prarthana kara atahpara tamra'i dike phire cala amara palanakarta nikate'i achena, kabula kare thakena; sandeha ne'i.
